page.title: 04Industry
page.content: Linslade, being an intense mixture of older-style small work units and general residential housing and flats, can obviously not be called highly industrialized. There are several small workshop type companies mainly supplemental to heavy industry in the area. Small light engineering units for machining and car body repair works cluster round the station area. One interesting enterprise is in the Soulbury road where a manufacturer/ assembler of unusual three wheeled specialist motor cycles has set up. This firm has been recognised by enthusiasts of specialist vehicles and has attracted attention in the motor cycle press and magazines although output is very small. Due to economic presures small industries in this area have not flourished.
